item.description:
Wolf Gang with The Royal Concept and Frank and Derol (tix $13)

Wolf Gang is one of my favorite bands. They're a foursome from London.  Most recently, they toured with Coldplay in the U.S. over the summer and also did some headline shows, including a July show in Boston, which is where I first saw them. They'll be playing at Brighton Music Hall on Oct. 25, and will be touring with Keane in the UK later in the fall. You can check them out here:
http://www.wolf-gang.co.uk/
https://www.facebook.com/thisiswolfgang
http://www.youtube.com/user/wolfgangvideos

Here's info on the 2 opening acts:

The Royal Concept, a foursome band from Sweden (http://www.royalconceptband.com/)

Frank and Derol, a duo from the U.S., Codi Caraco and Brandi Cyrus, (daughter of Billy Ray and sister of Miley Cyrus)

(http://www.frankandderol.com)

Meetup location: Doors are at 8:00PM and the show starts at 9:00PM.  Given that there are 2 opening acts, I suspect Wolf Gang won't be on until about 10:00PM.  I'll wait at the front bar inside the venue starting at 8:30PM (to the left past the entryway).  Feel free to text me when you arrive and I'll wave my hands in the air and jump up and down until you find me (kidding).

I've emailed my cell number to those who RSVPed.  If you're RSVPing on Wednesday or Thursday, just leave a note on the message board and I'll send you my cell number.
item.name: Wolf Gang
